Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleCharacteristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.internal.P_NativeGattObject<BluetoothGattCharacteristic>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleCharacteristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull, UsesInstanceId
    public final class BleCharacteristic
extends P_NativeGattObject<BluetoothGattCharacteristic>
implements UsesInstanceId
    Wrapper class which holds an instance of BluetoothGattCharacteristic. You should always check P_NativeGattObject.isNull() before doing anything with the BluetoothGattCharacteristic returned from getCharacteristic().

    • Method Detail

      • getCharacteristic

        public final BluetoothGattCharacteristic getCharacteristic()
        Returns the instance of BluetoothGattCharacteristic held in this class.

      • getDescriptors

        public final List<BleDescriptor> getDescriptors()
        Returns a list of BleDescriptors held in this characteristic.

      • getUuid

        public final UUID getUuid()
        Forwards BluetoothGattCharacteristic.getUuid(). Will return Uuids.INVALID if the backing characteristic is null.

      • getValue

        public final byte[] getValue()
        Forwards BluetoothGattCharacteristic.getValue(). Will return an empty array if the backing characteristic is null.

      • getService

        public final BleService getService()
        Returns an instance of BleService that holds the native BluetoothGattService which this characteristic belongs to. If the backing characteristic is null, BleService.NULL will be returned.

      • getDescriptor

        public final BleDescriptor getDescriptor​(UUID descriptorUuid)
        Returns an instance of BleDescriptor that holds the native BluetoothGattDescriptor for the UUID requested. If the descriptor is not found, BleDescriptor.NULL will be returned.

      • setInstanceId

        public void setInstanceId​(int id)
        Specified by:
        setInstanceId in interface UsesInstanceId

        public int getInstanceId()
        Specified by:
        getInstanceId in interface UsesInstanceId
